testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to approve the loan information of a user with a given ID through the API connection.
testcase.name: The contents of the data (id, loan_number, user_id, plan_id, amount,

failure.message: The parameter "Loan" was used but not defined. Define parameters using the JsonPath.params(...) function

testcase.failure:
Given The API user sets "api/loans/approve/17" path parameters..............passed And The API user records the response from the api loans approve endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then The API user verifies the content of the data in the response body which includes 17, "H5E646H6D65G", 49, 11, "2000.00000000", "80.00000000", 20, 25, "100.04000000", "0.00000000", 0, 20, "Bank info is wrong.", 1, "2023-12-15T15:53:39.000000Z", "2023-12-14T10:08:15.000000Z", "2023-12-15T15:53:39.000000Z".failed
